workspace
you define

Studio is a differentiated, global workspace where your company can thrive.

elevated
co‑working

We understand the importance of agility, and the need for companies of all sizes to be able to move quickly and to scale as needed — when needed. We know that the right space increases productivity, optimizes innovation, and promotes wellbeing, allowing companies to focus on what they do best. To meet the needs of an evolving workplace, we are pleased to offer a new type of workspace.

Fit for you

From flex desks, to co-working, to short-term and conventional leasing, we have a full spectrum of outstanding workspace solutions for you.

Higher standards

We offer private offices suites from one person up to the size you need. Locations feature premium acoustics, secure private networks, diverse meeting spaces, and varied common areas, all ready as part of instant plug-and-play solutions.

Global access

With our international network of properties, Studio gives you the ability to have a truly global footprint. Every property will boast the same exceptional level of services and amenities while having a unique environment based on location.

Like-minded community

Be part of a community of industry innovators and leading corporations with access to events and programming customized to your needs.

Exceptional services

Studio offers a holistic approach to services allowing you to focus on what you do best. Standard services include, complete IT solutions, concierge service, daily cleaning, mail and package handlings — and ZO.™

What is ZO.™?

Discover on-site and on-demand services that bring work and life together like never before. You get access to everything from food and fitness to education and transportation all at the tap of an app.

Rockefeller
Center, NYC

Find your workspace at an historic landmark. With more than 100 retail shops and restaurants, seven major New York City attractions and nine subway stations nearby, Rockefeller Center is a hub for shopping, dining and culture.
